title: The Silk Road
description: Following rumors of the Weaver, you investigate the luxury Silk Market. The nobles are buying garments woven with mind-altering, magical silk that subjugates their free will.

turns.narrative: The Merchant's stall is guarded by three enthralled Wardens wearing the magical silk cloaks.
turns.choice_a: Cut off their cloaks to break the spell
turns.consequence_a: You gracefully slice the cloaks. The Wardens collapse, confused but alive.
turns.choice_b: Kill the Wardens to reach the merchant
turns.consequence_b: You clear the guards efficiently, but their deaths will anger the Council.

turns.narrative: The Merchant tries to wrap you in a massive bolt of subjugation silk.
turns.choice_a: Burn the silk with a fire spell
turns.consequence_a: The silk is highly flammable. It burns, creating a massive fire in the market. The merchant is caught in the blaze.
turns.choice_b: Dodge the silk and pin him to the wall
turns.consequence_b: You capture him alive and secure the remaining, highly valuable silk safely.

market_burned.description: You burned the silk, destroying the market stall.

merchant_captured.description: You captured the merchant and the silk seamlessly.

conclusion: You burned the silk, destroying the market stall.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
